name: Cat Cannon: Crazy Blaster Quest Adventure
name_original: Cat Cannon: Crazy Blaster Quest Adventure
description:
This game is a challenging, addicting game that will keep you busy for hours! This mischevious dog must correctly aim and fire a cat out of his cannon to collect his dog bones for him. Try and get as many bones as you can in one shot!

Do you think you have what it takes to master this fun and addicting game?

Features:
* Great for Kids or Adults
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
